exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable P.
In environment L : Language t : fol.Term L m1, m2 : nat -> fol.Term L H : forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerm L t) -> m1 m = m2 m Unable to unify "subAllTerm t m2" with "subAllTerm t m1".
In environment L : Language t : fol.Term L m1, m2 : nat -> fol.Term L H : forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerm L t) -> m1 m = m2 m Unable to unify "m1 ?M1424 = m2 ?M1424" with "m1 = m2".

original: intros t m1 m2 H. induction t using Term_Terms_ind. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. f_equal. apply H. intros m HIn. apply IHt. auto.
